Configuration.Name: L1=20m_L2=3p5m_central_5A_apx5_NO_TILT_STAGE
Configuration.SetupScript: sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 28300') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5') config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 2700 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -23 config.bs = 3 config.beamcenterx = 89.3802 config.beamcenterz = 96.4242 config.drive()
